Title: Fancy Brudgom
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Gil Ozeri (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake tries to convince Charles to stand up to Vivian before the wedding, Terry struggles to stick to a diet after Amy and Gina give up, and Holt tries to get Rosa to make a sincere apology to an officer she offended.
